column2: The government will provide a support package to affected businesses and workers.
F&b establishments that choose to remain open for takeaway/delivery, they must continue to place their employees on the regular 14-day fet regime.
F&b establishments may serve as venues for marriage events and/or work-related events by third parties and are required to comply with the smms for these events.

F&b establishments are allowed to continue food service operations, with the exception of (i) establishments with pubs, bars, nightclubs, discos and karaoke sfa license categories or ssic codes starting with 5613, and (ii) nightlife operators that were allowed to pivot to f&b operations
